message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. Let me know if that works for you!
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $5000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, $5000 is a bit lower than I was thinking. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $10000. Let me know if that's more to your liking!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'm offering $7000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again, Bob. However, $7000 is still a bit lower than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to make one more compromise, so I'm counteroffering at $12000. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping you'll consider it. Let me know if it's something you'd be willing to accept!
